title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Two Upper Shelves, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table with Two Upper Shelves
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: odd / oak stock color / [triangle]XNa / 75.00 NF; at left and upper center of image, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong uppermost shelf has serpentine front and is raised on 2 columnar supports at front and 2 carved twisted straight supports at back; rectangular center shelf attaches mid-way above lower part and has 2 drawers front; piece slightly raised on 4 short rectangular feet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Two Upper Shelves, 1900–05. Graphite on cream tracing paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-82.
